question:
Which among the following recommendations of the Hunter Commission is/ are correct?
1. It recommended a special focus on primary education
2. It recommended encouragement in women education
3. Special attention was given on secondary and college education
4. It recommended for setting up of library in every school
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Hunter commission was appointed in the year 1882. It recommended a special focus on primary education and encouragement in women\'s education. Special attention was given to secondary and college education. Setting up the library in every school, providing the scholarship to meritorious students, privatization of school were the recommendation of the Hunter Commission.
